rows: Detailed description of the problem. For example, specify the circumstances that contributed to the problem cause or its influence on service availability.
Service team member who is responsible for resolving the problem.

Group of specialists within the department who are responsible for resolving the selected problem. You can customize user groups as the elements of the organizational structure in theRoles and userssection.
Relative importance of resolving the problem.
html:
Subject

Brief description of the problem.

Description

Detailed description of the problem. For example, specify the circumstances that contributed to the problem cause or its influence on service availability.

Owner

Service team member who is responsible for resolving the problem.

Assigned team

Group of specialists within the department who are responsible for resolving the selected problem. You can customize user groups as the elements of the organizational structure in the Roles and users section.

Priority

Relative importance of resolving the problem.
